name: Windshield Wars
description:
Windshield Wars: World Cup was uploaded to Gamejolt for the World Cup Jam

Windshield Wars: World Cup by AdvGoLeft - Game Jolt

Discord server:

https://discord.gg/kwjxhjhps6

While Windshield Wars was designed as a sports-based game, mixing the likes of Demolition Derby with Rugby, the overall vision for Windshield Wars is a game of action, aggressive vehicle combat, and eventually multiplayer fun!

Taking inspiration from classic titles like Twisted Metal, Rocket League, and Halo's Griffball, Windshield Wars aims to provide nonstop vehicular combat and high octane thrills!

Available modes:

-World Cup Mode: Battle your opponents in various arenas with uniquely challenging arena hazards until you win 4 out of 4 arenas. 

Upcoming modes:

-Story mode: Choose a vehicle/driver and fight your way through various levels until you claim your ultimate prize of fame and wealth!

-Last Man Standing: Choose your vehicle/driver and battle against your foes in one of 4 arenas until you are the last one alive and game points for completing arena objectives!

-Multiplayer: You and up to 3 friends battle it out in a series of unique arenas scoring objectives and destroying other drivers!

Follow for game updates as the road to release looms ever closer day by day!
